(Simplified: 铰)
Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: Objects with a metal 釒 joint 交; 交 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 交 [ jiāo ] to connect; to deliver, to exchange; to intersect; to mix
①用剪刀的兩刃相夾切，用剪刀剪：把繩子鉸開。
②一種金屬切削工具，稱“鉸刀”(方言，亦指剪刀)。
③用絞刀切削：鉸孔。
鉸鏈 [ jiǎo liàn ]: hinge
鉸刀 [ jiǎo dāo ]: reamer; scissors

鉸字的基本解释

鉸
jiǎo
见“铰”。

鉸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎo］
［《廣韻》古巧切，上巧，見。］
［《廣韻》古肴切，平肴，見。］
［《廣韻》古孝切，去效，見。］
“铰1”的繁体字。
(1)剪刀。
(2)剪。
(3)金属装饰。
(4)机械工业上用铰刀对孔进行精加工的一种方法。参见“鉸孔”。
(5)见“鉸鉸”。

鉸字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鉸； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1303第16
【廣韻】【韻會】?古巧切，音絞。【玉篇】釘鉸。【釋名】鏑，敵也。齊謂之鏃，關西謂之釘鉸，今凡刀柄鞍首，皆有釘鉸。　又【廣韻】鉸刀。【六書故】交刃刀也。利以翦。【李賀·五粒小松歌】綠波浸葉滿濃光，細束龍髥鉸刀翦。【註】束龍髥，形容松葉之齊，如刀翦截也。鉸，卽今婦功縫人所用者。俗呼翦刀。　又【廣韻】古肴切，音交。義同。　又【廣韻】古孝切【韻會】【正韻】居效切，?音敎。義同。　又【類篇】以金飾器也。【顏延之·赭白馬賦】寶鉸星纏。【註】鉸，裝飾也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎo］
["Guangyun" Gu Qiao cut, Shang Qiao, see you. ]
["Guangyun" ancient dishes cut, flat dishes, see. ]

Traditional characters for "Hinge 1".
(1) Scissors.
(2) Cut.
(3) Metal decoration.
(4) A method of finishing holes with a reamer in the machinery industry. See "Reaming".
(5) See "hinge hinge".

[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　 Hinge; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 1303-16
[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Gu Qiao cut, tone twist. [Jade articles] Nail hinge. [Release name] Dy, the enemy is also. Qi is called the arrowhead, and Kansai is called the nail hinge. Today, all knife handles and saddles have nail hinges.　[Guangyun] Reamer. [Six Books and Gu] It's also a swordsman. Li Yijian. 【Li He·Five Komatsu Song】The green wave soaks the leaves full of light, and the narrow beam of the dragon reamer. [Note] Shulong 髥, describes the Qi of pine leaves, like a sword cut. Hinge, the one used for sewing people in this woman's work. Common Hujian knife.　[Guangyun] Ancient delicacies cut, sound exchanged. The same meaning.　 [Guang Yun] Gu Xiaoqie [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] is effective and cut,? Sound. The same meaning.　[Classes] Again with gold ornaments. 【Yan Yanzhi·Ochre White Horse Fu】Bao Hing star wraps around. [Note] Hinge, decoration also.
